animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am grey and very big.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I am a common pet.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love bones.
🎾 I like to play with balls.
🐕 I am a loyal friend.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. I have webbed feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds.
🐥 I have baby ducklings.
🦆 I am a water bird.

animal.question: I roar loudly and live in the jungle. I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
👑 I am very powerful.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like vegetables.
🐇 I am fluffy.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I hiss and slither on the ground. Some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🌿 I like warm places.

animal.question: I chirp and fly in the sky. I build nests in trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪶 I have feathers.
🐛 I eat worms and insects.
🕊️ I can fly very high.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. I live in the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a mammal.
🍌 I like fruits.
🌳 I live in groups.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I am a horse-like animal that lives in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am a herbivore.
⚫ I have a unique pattern.
🌍 I live in grasslands.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and roots, but I'm smaller than you. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sun to grow.
🌻 I can be many different colors!
🪴 You can plant me in a pot.

plant.question: I grow tall and have a thick brown trunk. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am bigger than a bush.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍁 I have leaves that change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me!
🥬 I'm a vegetable you might eat raw, or in a salad.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. People love to put me on their pizza. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I'm a fruit, but we often eat me like a vegetable.
🍝 Ketchup is made from me.
🌱 I need lots of sun to grow big and juicy.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and beautiful petals, and people give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I come in many colors like red, pink and yellow.
🐝 Bees like to visit me for my nectar.
💘 People often give me to someone they love.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when heated. You often eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿I start as a small yellow seed.
🌽 I come from a tall plant.
🎬 You often eat me in a dark room with a big screen.

plant.question: I'm a big, yellow fruit with a thick peel. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow on trees in warm places.
🟡 You peel me before you eat me.
💪 Eating me gives you lots of energy.

plant.question: I'm a tall grass that is strong but flexible. Sometimes pandas eat me too. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 Pandas love eating me.
🌱 I grow very fast and tall in warm climates.
🏡 I'm also a building material in some countries.

plant.question: I am a seed that you grind to make flour. You need me to bake bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 You need to grind me into a powder.
🍞 I am often used in sandwiches and toast.
☀️ Farmers grow me in big fields.

plant.question: I am a spiky fruit, brown on the outside and white on the inside, that grows on a palm tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I need tropical climate to grow.
🔪 You need to use a tool to cut through my tough outside
🥛 I have a tasty juice inside and can be shredded!
